about_the_game:
Enter Kurogane Castle, an ancient fortress steeped in mystery and haunted by restless spirits. As players, you’ll battle ghostly apparitions and solve intricate puzzles scattered throughout the decaying halls. Guided by an enchanted doll, whose fragmented memories hold the key to breaking the castle's curse, you must uncover secrets and confront the tragic past. Can you unravel the whispers and free the castle from its dark legacy? Your chilling adventure awaits!

Key Features:

  • Puzzle Solving:

    • Hidden Puzzles: Solve intricate environmental puzzles to unlock hidden story elements, new areas, and secret memories of the enchanted doll. These puzzles are key to uncovering the castle’s tragic history and breaking the curse.

    • Memory Fragments: As you progress, collect fragments of the enchanted doll’s memories. These pieces not only reveal her backstory but also provide cryptic clues that help you solve puzzles and unlock new abilities.

  • Inventory & Resource Management:

    • Limited Inventory: Manage your resources carefully, as your inventory space is limited. Collect health potions, ammo, tools, and ritual items to aid your journey. Conserve your ammunition for intense combat and use healing items strategically.

    • Ritual Items: Find special items and artifacts needed to perform rituals and banish powerful spirits. These rituals are key to unlocking the deeper mysteries of the castle and weakening the curse.

    Game Mechanics:

    • Combat with Spiritual Gun & Spiritual Katana: Engage in dynamic combat against a variety of spirits and cursed entities. Use the spiritual gun to dispatch long-range enemies and the katana for close-quarters battles. Master the art of both ranged and melee combat to survive the castle’s many threats.

    • Item & Inventory System: Collect and manage health items, ritual tools, and weapons. Use your limited inventory space wisely to ensure you're prepared for whatever lies ahead. Ammo is scarce, so don’t waste it!

    • Hidden Puzzles & Doll Secrets: Solve environmental puzzles to unlock new paths, discover hidden rooms, and uncover pieces of the doll's mysterious past. As you piece together her memories, new abilities and clues will help you confront the castle's dark forces.

      Atmosphere & Horror:

      • Immersive Horror Experience: Stunning visuals, a haunting soundtrack, and detailed environments bring the oppressive atmosphere of Kurogane Castle to life. Every creak of the floorboards, every flicker of candlelight, and every shadow lurking in the corner will keep you on edge.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
